26 template <class Base>
27 class TCopySerializedWrap: public istd::TUpdateManagerWrap<Base>
28 {
29 public:
30  typedef istd::TUpdateManagerWrap<Base> BaseClass;
31 
32  // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)
33  virtual bool CopyFrom(const istd::IChangeable& object, istd::IChangeable::CompatibilityMode mode = BaseClass::CM_WITHOUT_REFS);
34  virtual bool IsEqual(const istd::IChangeable& object) const;
35 };

40 // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)
41 
42 template <class Base>
43 bool TCopySerializedWrap<Base>::CopyFrom(const istd::IChangeable& object, istd::IChangeable::CompatibilityMode mode)
44 {
45  if (BaseClass::CopyFrom(object, mode)){
46  return true;
47  }
48  else if (mode == BaseClass::CM_WITHOUT_REFS){
49  return CopyByArchive(object, *this);
50  }
51  else{
52  return false;
53  }
54 }
55 
56 
57 template <class Base>
58 bool TCopySerializedWrap<Base>::IsEqual(const istd::IChangeable& object) const
59 {
60  if ((BaseClass::GetSupportedOperations() & istd::IChangeable::SO_COMPARE) && (object.GetSupportedOperations() & istd::IChangeable::SO_COMPARE)){
61  return BaseClass::IsEqual(object);
62  }
63 
64  return CompareByArchive(object, *this);
65 }
